forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy, showers with a few rumbles of thunder. Low 4C.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and thunder. Lows overnight in the low 40s.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers likely. It will be windy at times, especially early. Low 4C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Thundershowers overnight following a period of rain early. Low near 40F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Thunder possible. High 8C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Thunder possible. High 47F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low around 5C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 41F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 8C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 46F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 37F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 8C. Winds NNE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 47F. Winds NNE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 2C. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 36F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 9C. Winds NNE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 49F. Winds NNE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 3C. Winds NE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 38F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High near 10C. Winds NNE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 49F. Winds NNE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 5C. Winds NE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 41F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 8C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 46F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 3C. Winds NE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 38F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 9C. Winds NNE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 48F. Winds NNE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 2C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low around 35F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 9C. SE winds shifting to W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 48F. SE winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 4C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low near 40F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 8C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 47F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 4C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 38F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
